name: Tyr
title: God of Justice
symbol: Balanced scales resting on a warhammer
description: Tyr is the even-handed god of justice, the greatest of the Triad alongside Ilmater and Torm. Blind and missing his right hand, Tyr sees truth through divine insight rather than mortal eyes. He demands fairness, law, and righteous judgment from his followers, and his temples serve as courts of law throughout the Realms.

thresholds.benefit: You can cast Command once. You regain this ability after a long rest.
You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine if someone is lying.
You can cast Zone of Truth once without expending a spell slot. You regain this ability after a long rest.
Your weapon attacks deal an extra 1d6 radiant damage against creatures that have harmed an innocent within the last 24 hours.
